Text: Old Barag Banner (Mongolian: ᠬᠠᠭᠤᠴᠢᠨ ᠪᠠᠷᠭᠤ ᠬᠣᠰᠢᠭᠤ Қаучин Бару қосиу "Qaɣučin Barɣu qosiɣu"; ) is a banner of northeastern Inner Mongolia, People's Republic of China.
